# RUN: llvm-mc -disassemble -triple m68k %s | FileCheck %s

# CHECK: btst    %d3, %a0
0x07 0x08

# CHECK: btst    %d5, -(%a2)
0x0b 0x22

# CHECK: btst    #20, -(%a4)
0x08 0x24 0x00 0x14

# CHECK: btst    %d5, (79,%sp,%a0)
0x0b 0x37 0x88 0x4f

# CHECK: btst    %d4, (%a2)+
0x09 0x1a

# CHECK: btst    %d6, (8217,%pc)
0x0d 0x3a 0x20 0x19

# CHECK: btst #20, %d3
0x08 0x03 0x00 0x14
